alert.note: Alert for Bolivar Peninsula; Chambers; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 9:59PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Galveston, northeastern Brazoria, western Chambers and southeastern Harris Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 958 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Highlands to Santa Fe to 6 miles west of San Luis Pass. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pasadena, southeastern Pearland, League City, Baytown, Galveston Causeway, Galveston Island West End, Texas City, Friendswood, La Porte, Deer Park, Alvin, Dickinson, La Marque, Santa Fe, Seabrook, Webster, Hitchcock, Beach City, Kemah and Cloverleaf. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for southeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Bolivar Peninsula; Chambers; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris
